name: BBQ Chicken Thighs
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Marinate chicken thighs in BBQ for a tender and flavorful meal from Chungah Rhee of Damn Delicious.
ingredients: Reynolds Wrap® Non Stick Aluminum Foil
directions: Whisk together ketchup, vinegar, brown sugar, molasses, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and water
Combine ketchup mixture and chicken in a gallon-size slider bag or large bowl; refrigerate and marinate for at least 1 hour to overnight, turning the bag occasionally
Drain the chicken from the marinade; discard marinade
Make drainage holes in a sheet of Reynolds Wrap® Non-Stick Foil with a grilling fork
Place foil sheet on grill grate with non-stick (dull) side facing up
Add chicken to grill and cook, flipping once and basting with reserved 1/3 cup marinade until cooked through, about 10 to 12 minutes on each side
Serve immediately, garnished with parsley, if desired
